Swedish game developers are THE best.

Great release!

But remember that this is a game made by fans, who put the effort that companies don't. Once it gets properly patched, buy it!

Definitely buy this game if you like it.  I have played the original hearts of iron 2 game for uncountable hundreds of hours over the years.  This is a game made by people who care, and has immense single player value (basically limitless unique replays, compared to the 4 to 10 hours of scripted action available in most modern FPS games or whatever).

Regardless, thanks for the torrent.  I will try the game and if it works well without the need to wait for patches, I will buy from steam for $20 (probably be $10 in a few months anyways).

Yep, I bought this.

If you get a chance buy it later on. So great Grand Strategy is supported. Even if not DL it and try it out its great. 

If you have never tried a Paradox game because you thought the graphics are not the best then you are missing out.
Great game. Made by fans, if you like, buy it! It's very cheap and will allow the developers to keep developing this great game for you.

Thanks a lot for this! I loved HoI and HoI 2, but HoI 3 was a huge disappointment for me, so I've waited for this for a long time!

Got some nasty virus after installing this game, cant say Iam 100% sure if it was from this torrent but 99.9%. At the end of the installation when asked if u wanna install direct X I did and imedietly after that AVG and windows alerted that core files in windows had been infected. Found out later that AVG had blocked and removed D-tool and other programs aswell.
Trojan.Agents found:
Gen-SSHNas
Gen-Clickspy
Gen
Gen-RefPron
Gen-Scatter
Gen-EVid
Adware.Vundo Variant
